PART I]    THE GAZETTE O F PAKISTAN, EXTRA., DECEMBER 4,  2021  59 
 
 
    
  
ISLAMABAD,  MONDAY ,  FEB RUARY  21,  2022  
 
PART I  
 
Acts, Ordinances, President’s Orders and Regulations  
 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKISTAN  
LAW AND JUSTICE DIVISION  
 
Islamabad , the 19th February , 2021 
 
 No. F. 2(1)/2022-Pub.— The following Ordinance Promulgat ed on 1 9th 
February, 2022 by the Presid ent is hereby pub lished for general information: — 
 
ORDINANCE NO . I OF 2022  
 
AN 
 
ORDINANCE  
 
further to amend the Elections Act, 2017  
 
 WHEREAS , it is expedient further to amend the Elections Act, 2017 
(XXXIII of 2017) for the purposes hereinafter appea ring; 
 
 AND WHEREAS , the Senate and the National Assembly are not in session 
and the President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan is satisfied that 
circumstances exist which render it necessary to take immediate action ; 
 
 
 
(59) 
 
 Price : Rs. 5.00 
 
[7320(2022)/Ex. Gaz.]   
 
60      THE GAZETTE  OF  PAKISTAN,  EXTRA.,  FEBRUARY   21,  2022      [PART I 
 
  NOW THEREFORE , in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (1) of 
Article 89 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President 
of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan its pleased to make and promulgate the 
following Ordinance namely: - 
 
 1. Short title  and commencement. — (1) This  Ordinance shall be 
called the Elections (Amendment) Ordinance, 2022.  
 
 (2) It shall come  into force at once.  
  
 2. Amendments  of section 181, XXXIII of 2017. — (1) In the 
Elections Act, 2017  (XXXIII of 2017), after suction 181, the following new 
section 1 81(A) shall be inserted, namely :— 
 
 “181A.  Act to have overriding effect. —Notwithstanding anything to the 
contrary under th is Act, rule or code of conduct or any other law, a 
member of Parliament ( Majlis-e-Shoora), provincial assembly or 
elected member of Local Government, including member holding 
any other office under the Constitution or any other law shall, 
subject  to sections 170 clause (a) sub -clause (v), 175 (h) , sub - 
section (1) of section 180, 181 and 182, may visit or address public 
meetings in any area or constituency  during election campaign . 
 
 
 
  
  
 DR. ARIF ALVI , 
 President . 
 
 
————  
 
 
 
RAJA NAEEM AKBAR,  
Secretary . 
  
 
 
  
 
PRINTED  BY THE MANAGER, PRINTING CO RPORATION OF  PAKISTAN PRESS,  ISLAMABAD .  
PUBLISHED BY THE  DEPUTY CONTROLLER, STATIONERY AND FORMS, UNIVERSITY ROAD, KARACHI .
